name: chlorinated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having had the chemical chlorine added, usually to kill bacteria: chlorinated swimming pools Many communities use chlorinated drinking water. See
chlorinate
More examplesFewer examplesKeep the pool clean and chlorinated.State law requires that waste water be chlorinated before it is put to any kind of industrial use.Cooling off at the beach is better than a chlorinated swimming pool. The company dumped chlorinated solvents into groundwater, creating a half-mile-wide toxic plume.
